source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SEQ_00<tab>Galiena is reasonably sure you are the adventurer she is looking for.
target: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SEQ_00<tab>ラールガーズリーチのガリエナは、冒険者に依頼したいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SEQ_01<tab>In Rhalgr's Reach you are approached by Galiena, who has been instructed by “Aunt Rowena” to request your assistance with the exploration of a recently discovered island. The island in question is apparently somewhere in the Far East, and if you are interested in learning more, you will have no choice but to journey once more to distant Kugane and speak with Kotokaze, the esteemed proprietress of the Shiokaze Hostelry.
target: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SEQ_01<tab>ガリエナから、依頼について話を聞いた。依頼主はロウェナで、内容は未知の島を調査するというものらしい。詳しい話を聞くため、クガネの潮風亭にいる「コトカゼ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SEQ_02<tab>After being shown to a private table, you are joined by Krile, as well as Rowena and Hancock, who have recently become partners after a fashion. The pair explain that they have joined forces in an effort to develop the aforementioned island, which could serve as a new port of call for trading vessels seeking to circumvent the high tariffs of Kugane. Alas, this will not be a simple endeavor, as the previous expedition met with failure at the hands─rather, the claws and teeth─of the innumerable savage beasts that inhabit the island. Warriors of consummate skill are needed, and you stand above all others in their minds. Krile, for her part, has a personal stake in the expedition, though she begs leave to say no more unless her suspicions regarding the island prove true.
target: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SEQ_02<tab>コトカゼと話し、ロウェナたちと話す場を作ってもらった。ロウェナは、ハンコック、クルルとともに現れ、クガネ南方で発見された未知の島について聞き、その調査隊に参加することになった。クガネの第一波止場にいる職人と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SEQ_03<tab>Duly advised to go on ahead to the waiting expedition vessel, you come upon Gerolt Blackthorne, by all accounts the finest weaponsmith in all of Eorzea─and an accomplished drunkard besides─locked in a bitter dispute with a belligerent scholar who you soon learn is Ejika Tsunjika of the Students of Baldesion. A contemporary of Krile, he demands to take part in the expedition, having learned of Krile's interest in the island. Krile consents, and Ejika boards without further comment─for the time being. All that remains is to journey to the mysterious island dubbed “Eureka” and see what mysteries await...
target: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SEQ_03<tab>ゲロルトと合流した。また、バルデシオン委員会の生き残りであるエジカ・ツンジカも、調査隊に同行することとなった。彼らやクルルとともに、「禁断の地 エウレカ」と名づけられた島での新たな冒険を始めよう！

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Kotokaze in Kugane.
target: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_TODO_00<tab>潮風亭のコトカゼと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_TODO_01<tab>Rendezvous with the craftsman at Pier #1.
target: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_TODO_01<tab>職人と合流

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GALIENA_000_000<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>─of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, if I'm not mistaken?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GALIENA_000_000ちょっといい？
あなた、「暁」に所属している冒険者よね？

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GALIENA_000_001<tab>Very good. I've a message for you from Aunt Rowena. Well, it's more of a request, I suppose, though I don't have any details of consequence...
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GALIENA_000_001よかった！
実は、あなたに依頼したいことがあるのよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GALIENA_000_002<tab>She'd like you to assist with the exploration of a recently discovered island. Surely you'd be interested in that sort of thing, being an adventurer?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GALIENA_000_002ロウェナ叔母さん直轄の案件だから、あたしもよく知らないけど、
最近、発見された未知の島の調査に協力してほしいとか。
……興味、あるわよね？

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GALIENA_000_003<tab>If you are, then you should head to Kugane and see Kotokaze, the proprietress of the Shiokaze Hostelry. It's a long way to go, I know, but the island's out that way anyway, so...
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GALIENA_000_003なら、クガネにある潮風亭って酒場に行ってちょうだい。
顔役の「コトカゼ」って人に話せば、
叔母さんと話す場を作ってくれる手はずになってるわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GALIENA_000_010<tab>I'd tell you all about Aunt Rowena's proposition if I could, but I honestly don't know anything else. You'll need to head to Kugane to learn more.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GALIENA_000_010ロウェナ叔母さんの依頼に興味があるなら、
潮風亭の「コトカゼ」って人に話してみて。
叔母さんと話す場を作ってくれるはずよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KOTOKAZE_000_020<tab>I see you decided to accept the invitation of the House of Splendors. Rowena will be pleased. Come─I will show you to your table.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KOTOKAZE_000_020ロウェナ商会との商談かい？
話は聞いてるし、席代ももらってるよ。
先方に連絡を入れるから、上の席で待っていておくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_ROWENA_000_040<tab>It's good to see a familiar face in these parts─particularly that o' the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who might well be my most valued customer.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_ROWENA_000_040異国で知った顔に会えるのは、嬉しいものね。
それが、ウチの上得意客で、しかも腕利きだっていうなら、
なおのこと……よく来てくれたわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_041<tab>I gather you were not expecting Krile or myself to be attending this little tête-à-tête. As you will see, however, this is a matter which concerns us all.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_041オォ～、)) (( )) 02 /var>さんが驚いてますネ。
私とクルルさんが一緒に来るとは、意外デスか？
これには深～い事情があるのデ～ス！

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_042<tab>It all began when a vessel of the East Aldenard Trading Company happened upon an island in the Glass Ocean. A deserted island which was not recorded on our charts and, quite frankly, had no business being there.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_042そもそもの事の起こりは、我々、東アルデナード商会の交易船が、
クガネ南方の海上で、海図にない島を発見したことなのデス。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_043<tab>Suffice it to say, we were surprised. Pleasantly so, in fact. An unclaimed, undeveloped island in such a location would be a boon to our trading concerns in this corner of the world.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_043これは我々にとって、嬉しい驚きでした。
もし、誰のものでもない無人島なのであれば、
素晴らしい貿易の中継地になり得ますからネ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_ROWENA_000_044<tab>Kugane's bleedin' us both dry with its tariffs. Dependin' on the goods, we're paying more than ten times what we'd owe in Limsa or Ul'dah─which is already too damn much, believe you me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_ROWENA_000_044このクガネって、入港税がすごい高いのよ。
リムサ・ロミンサやウルダハと比べると数十倍よ、数十倍。
ひんがしの国の役人は、とんでもない強欲の悪党ね。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_045<tab>What my dear Rowena is trying to say is that having an additional port of call in this region─one more amenable to free trade─would be in the best interests of a great many parties.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_045まぁ、そういうわけで、入港税不要の中継地があれば、
東方交易……特に、これから活発化するだろうドマとの交易で、
大きな利益を生むはずデス。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_046<tab>Which is why, upon learning of this island, I immediately authorized an exploratory expedition. The team was large and well funded─I spared no expense. Alas, only a handful returned.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_046デスから、我々は件の島が開拓可能かどうか調べるため、
調査隊を送り込んだのですが……。
帰還できたのは、ごくわずかな人員のみでした。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_047<tab>The survivors reported “irregularities” with the island's aether, which we believe gave rise to a number of strange and monstrous beasts─beasts which set upon them not long after they arrived.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_047生還した生き残りの報告によると、
島には、異様なエーテルの力を帯びた魔物がはびこり、
上陸するなり、襲いかかってきたのだとか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_048<tab>This regrettable turn of events forced us to reevaluate our assessment of the island and put our plans on hold for a time. If development was to proceed, it would require a great deal more capital than originally anticipated...
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_048かように危険な島となると、拠点の整備には、
莫大な資金が必要となりますから、旨味は激減デ～ス。
そんなわけで、計画の中止を検討していたのデスが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_ROWENA_000_049<tab>So he came to me and mine for a handout, and I obliged. But before you scoff, know that some of my regular customers were members o' that failed expedition, and what they told me was enough to justify the expense.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_ROWENA_000_049ウチの商会が出資をもちかけたってワケ。
調査に参加した冒険者に、ロウェナ商会の上客がいてね、
いろいろ面白い話を聞かせてもらったのよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_ROWENA_000_050<tab>Tales o' treasure, of untold wealth and riches and gods know what else. Aye, we'll have to wade through all 'em beasties, but with great risk comes great reward, as they say.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_ROWENA_000_050話によると、その島……
結構なお宝が眠っていそうなものでね。
危険と利益は表裏一体……コレ、商売の鉄則よ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_051<tab>Spoken like a born entrepreneur! Your ambition and ruthlessness are admirable, my lady. I daresay I could stand to learn a thing or two from you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_051フゥ～、さすがは新進気鋭のロウェナ商会の女主デ～ス。
その儲け話を逃さない耳ざとさ、見習いたいものデスネ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_052<tab>...In any event, having formed our partnership, we wish to dispatch a second joint expeditionary force to the island. That said, if we were to send just anyone, their fate is like to be the same as that of the first.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_052……ともかく、こうして心強い協力者を得られた我々は、
再度、問題の島へ調査隊を送ることにしました。
デスが、半端者を投入しても、前回の二の舞デス。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_ROWENA_000_051<tab>So this time, we've a mind to send a dab hand. A veteran of a thousand thousand battles. A tried-and-true killer. You see where I'm goin' with this?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_ROWENA_000_051だから、あたしたちが知る最高の戦力を使おうってことになってね。
あなたに声をかけたってわけ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_052<tab>While I lack your aptitude for warcraft, I will be joining the expedition as a researcher. The Scions have an interest in this island─
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_052私は……戦力というより、現地の研究調査が目的ね。
「暁」にも依頼が来て、私が参加することになったの。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_053<tab>...How perceptive of you. You are right─this is not the sort of affair that would normally concern us. However, after speaking with the others, they have consented to my participation, on account of my <var 1A 02 /var>personal<var 1A 01 /var> interest...
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_053「暁」が協力する案件じゃなさそう、ってところかしら？
でも、ちょっと気になることがあって、
もしかしたらって考えると、どうしても無視できなくてね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_054<tab>You will forgive me if I say no more at this time. If my suspicions prove true, then I will tell you everything. I promise.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_054ごめんなさい、あやふやな話で。
確証が得られたら、ちゃんと説明するから、
いまはこれで許してちょうだい。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_055<tab>Right, then. I believe that covers everything! The company ship that will deliver you to the island is waiting to receive you. You may proceed to the pier whenever you are ready to depart.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_055さて、話がまとまったところで、行動開始といきましょう。
現地までの足となる商船が、洋上に待機しています。
第一波止場で連絡艇に乗ってくださいネ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_ROWENA_000_057<tab>Oh, and so you're not surprised─you'll have company. A craftsman whose help I reckoned we ought to have. He should be at the pier already.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_ROWENA_000_057そうそう、支援担当の職人も連れてきてあるわ。
いまごろ第一波止場に到着しているはずだから、
まずは、そいつと合流してちょうだい。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_058<tab>Rowena and I still have a few things to discuss, so why don't you go on ahead? I'll catch up to you later.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_058私はロウェナさんたちとの打ち合わせがまだ残ってるから、
先に第一波止場に向かってちょうだい。
……それじゃ、またあとで。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_060<tab>No matter how many times you say it, I refuse to take no for an answer! I am getting on that ship, and that is the end of it!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_060俺をあの島まで連れて行け！
何度も言っているが、俺には行かねばならん事情があるのだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GEROLT_000_070<tab>...And no matter how many times <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> say it, ye whiny little shite, I ain't about to let a bloody stranger waltz up and deign to tell me which way my bread is buttered! Now piss off!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GEROLT_000_070そっちの事情なンざ、知ったことか！
俺はテメェみてえなうるせえヤツが大ッ嫌いなンだよ！
そもそも、見ず知らずの野郎を連れていけるかってンだ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_071<tab>(-Incorrigible Youth-)Does your Eorzean stubbornness know no end!? I have urgent business on that island, and I demand you take me there at once!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_071(-ララフェル族の青年-)これだから、エオルゼアの野蛮人は……っ！
いいからあの島へ俺を連れて行け！

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_072<tab>I could hear the shouting half a malm away...
target: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_072<tab>(-？？？？-)あら、そんなところで立ち尽くしてどうしたの？

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_073<tab>Gerolt, what is all the fuss about?
target: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_073<tab>さっそくトラブルかしら、ゲロルトさん？

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GEROLT_000_074<tab>Oh, Miss Krile. Sorry about that. It's this here bastard what's causing trouble.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_GEROLT_000_074おう、クルル嬢ちゃんか。
この野郎がしつこくてよぉ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_075<tab>Ejika!? What are you doing here?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_075エジカ……！？
なんで、あなたがこんなところに！

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_076<tab>Did you really think I wouldn't find out about your letter? The nerve of you, trying to get a head start on your own! Well─sorry to spoil your plans.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_076はっ、決まっているだろう。
貴様が賢人会宛てに送った報告の内容を、人づてに聞いたのだ。
抜け駆けするつもりだったのだろうが、残念だったな。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_077<tab>Don't be difficult. I had every intention of requesting your assistance if and when I confirmed my hypothesis was correct...
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_077そんなわけないでしょうに……。
自分の推測に確信が持てていれば、
あなたにも協力してもらうつもりだったわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_078<tab>Forgive me. You must be completely at a loss.
target: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_078<tab>ごめんなさい、状況が飲み込めないわよね？

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_080<tab>This gentleman on the right is Gerolt Blackthorne, by all accounts the finest weaponsmith in all of Eorzea. He will be lending his considerable expertise to our expedition.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_080こちらのハイランダー族の男性が、ゲロルトさん。
エオルゼア随一の武具職人で、今回の調査に同行して、
技術面の支援を担当してくれることになっているの。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_090<tab>This gentleman on the right is─ Wait, you already know each other, do you not? Well, as you may have guessed, Gerolt will be lending his considerable expertise to our expedition.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_090ゲロルトさん……とは、知り合いなんでしょ？
今回の調査に同行して、
技術面の支援を担当してくれることになっているの。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_100<tab>And on the left, we have─
target: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_100<tab>で、こっちが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_101<tab>Ejika Tsunjika, of the Students of Baldesion. And you must be the so-called Warrior of Light. Charmed, I'm sure. I'll thank you not to get underfoot.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_101バルデシオン委員会所属、エジカ・ツンジカだ。
貴様の噂は聞いているぞ、「暁」の冒険者……。
俺の邪魔だけはしてくれるなよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_102<tab>Manners, Ejika! If you intend to accompany us on this expedition─
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_102エジカ、ちょっと失礼よ。
というか、あなたも調査に同行するつもりなの？

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_103<tab>Of course I do! If you think I'm about to let a by-the-book traditionalist like you conduct an independent investigation, you've got another think coming!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_EJIKATSUNJIKA_000_103当然だろう！
正統な後継者だと思い上がる貴様だけに、
あの島の調査を行わせるなど、俺が許すものか！

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_104<tab>...I should be glad to welcome the assistance of a preeminent scholar such as yourself. Now, if you would be so kind as to stop badgering poor Gerolt and board the ship, we can get underway.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_104……いいわ、優秀な研究員は歓迎だもの。
私の方から話を通しておいてあげるから、
口論はやめて、大人しく乗船してちょうだい。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_105<tab>Ejika is one of the few surviving Students of Baldesion. While his expertise in aetherology is impressive by any measure, alas, so is his ego...
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_105エジカは、バルデシオン委員会時代の同僚なの。
私を含めて数少ない「生き残り」といったところかしら。
エーテル学の研究員としては一流だけど、性格はあのとおりよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_106<tab>But enough about him! We have an island to explore! If you've no matters left to attend to, speak with Rodney. He will show you aboard.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_106さて、それじゃあ、私も乗船するとしましょうか。
準備ができたら、「ロドニー」さんに声をかけて。
現地へ向かう船までの連絡艇を出してくれるわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_107<tab>Hmm... It occurs to me that no one bothered to tell you the name of the island we mean to explore. Am I correct?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_107そうそう！
言い忘れてたけど、これから向かう島には、
調査にあたって、仮の名前がつけられているの。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_108<tab>It's a bit grandiose and melodramatic, but we've tentatively named it for a place from Allagan legend. A forbidden land where fearsome weapons were hidden away for safekeeping...
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_108古代アラグ帝国の伝承に残る、
危険な武器を封印した迷宮の名からとって、
こう呼ばれているわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_109<tab>We call it...Eureka.
target: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KRILE_000_109<tab>禁断の地、エウレカ……ってね。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>You now have access to the Forbidden Land, Eureka Anemos. Anemos can be explored in parties of up to eight players, or solo.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SYSTEM_000_110ソロから、フルパーティ（8人）まで、
任意の人数で挑むことができる探索型コンテンツ、
「禁断の地 エウレカ：アネモス編」に挑戦可能になりました。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SYSTEM_000_111<tab>To embark on your journey to Anemos, speak with Rodney at Pier #1 in Kugane.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SYSTEM_000_111「ロドニー」に話しかけて、
「禁断の地 エウレカ：アネモス編」を選択することで、
探索を開始することができます。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SYSTEM_100_111<tab>Please be advised that all excursions into the Forbidden Land, Eureka, are item level synced. For Anemos, gear exceeding an item level of <var 20 E802 /var> will be adjusted.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SYSTEM_100_111「禁断の地 エウレカ：アネモス編」では、
アイテムレベルシンクが設定されており、装備品の性能が、
「アイテムレベル：」以下になるよう調整されます。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SYSTEM_000_112<tab>While exploring Anemos, you will have the opportunity to create Eureka gear and weapons. If you wish to do so, it would be prudent to acquire level 70 antiquated items in advance.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SYSTEM_000_112コンテンツ内では、「エウレカウェポン」の製作を行えます。
探索を開始する前に、素材となるレベル70用のジョブ専用装備を、
準備しておくとよいでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SYSTEM_000_113<tab>Should you wish to know more about Eureka Anemos and what it has to offer, you may speak with Rodney for further details.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_SYSTEM_000_113また、「ロドニー」からは、
コンテンツのルールなど、より詳しい情報を聞くことができます。
探索前に、確認しておきましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KOTOKAZE_000_030<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_KOTOKAZE_000_030<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_056<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDY401_03078_HANCOCK_000_056<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
